Sep. *****(PHONE), 20:42: Sehr geehrter Kunde, vielen Dank, dass Sie mit Aspiegel Kontakt aufgenommen haben. Wir hoffen, dass es Ihnen gut geht. Um Ihnen die beste Lösung anbieten zu können, bitten wir Sie, Ihre Anfrage mit den folgenden Informationen zu präzisieren: 1. Eine Beschreibung des Problems 2. Ein Screenshot oder eine Videoaufnahme des Fehlers 3. Wann das Problem aufgetreten ist 4. Ihre Huawei-ID: App Gallery>HMS core>Öffnen und dann einen Screenshot machen 5. Ihr Handymodell 6. SN-Nummer Ihres Geräts 7. Version der App-Galerie: Huawei App-Galerie>Mich> Über 8. HMS Core Version: Huawei App-Galerie>HMS-Kern>Öffnen> Einstellungen> Über 9. Verwandte App 10. Version der verwandten App 11. Das Protokoll der App-Galerie Wenn Sie weitere Fragen haben, antworten Sie bitte auf diesen E-Mail-Thread und wir werden Ihnen gerne weiterhelfen. Mit freundlichen Grüßen, *****(PER) Customer Support team A Aspiegel SE é uma empresa constituída segundo as leis da *****(LOC), com sede em Dublin, *****(LOC). Aspiegel SE é o provedor de Huawei Mobile Services para Huawei e Honor proprietários de dispositivos na Europa, Canadá, Austrália, Nova Zelândia e outros países. Thank You for Your support to making it possible. Kind regards, Client From: xxxxx@xxxx.com Sent: Wednesday, August 10, *****(PHONE) 2:30 PM To: xxxxx@xxxx.com Subject: RE : OD: Full refund from first day Dear customer, We appreciate you patience, our internal team reached us back and they informed us that they suggest you to contact developer first with the proof that the products are not as advertised and if developer agrees to refund, you can provide that proof to us. You should be able to contact the Customer support of the game on: https://aihelp.net/privacypolicy/ or Customer Service: xxxxx@xxxx.com. If you have further game issue, you also can directly contact our dedicated game operation staff through discord channel. Here is the discord link (Poland): https://discord.gg/tkYZC5CAGu that serves your country. We would greatly appreciate your feedback regarding our email exchange, as we need your input to keep improving our service. Therefore, we invite you to fill in the survey that will soon arrive on the email address you used to contact us. If you have any further questions, please feel free to reply to this email thread and we will be happy to walk you through your doubts. Sincerely, Ramon Aspiegel Customer Support team Aspiegel SE is a company incorporated under the laws of Ireland with its headquarters in Dublin, Ireland. Aspiegel SE is the provider of Huawei Mobile Services to Huawei and Honor device owners in *****(LOC), Canada, Australia, New Zealand and other countries. Interaction content: Cher client, Merci d'avoir contacté Aspiegel. Nous espérons que vous allez bien. Cet email est au sujet de votre souci concernant votre problème avec AppGallery. Afin d'être en mesure d'approfondir l'enquête, pouvez-vous s'il vous plaît nous fournir les éléments suivants : 1. Une description du problème 2. Une capture d'écran ou un enregistrement vidéo de l'erreur 3. Quand le problème s'est produit 4. Votre identifiant Huawei : App Gallery>HMS core>Ouvrir puis faire une capture d'écran. 5. Le modèle de votre téléphone 6. Le numéro SN de votre appareil 7. Version App Gallery: Huawei App Gallery>Moi>À propos de 8. Version de HMS Core : Huawei App Gallery>HMS Core>Ouvrir>Paramètres>À propos de 9. Application concernée 10. Version de l'application concernée 11. Le journal de App Gallery Merci de votre coopération. Pour d’autres questions, n’hésitez pas à répondre à ce fil de discussion et nous serons heureux de vous guider à travers vos doutes. Cordialement, *****(PER) d'assistance à la clientèle d'Aspiegel A Aspiegel SE é uma empresa constituída segundo as leis da Irlanda, com sede em *****(LOC), Irlanda. Aspiegel SE é o provedor de Huawei Mobile Services para Huawei e Honor proprietários de dispositivos na Europa, Canadá, Austrália, Nova Zelândia e outros países. Interaction content: That is very unfortunate because I've been contacting PayPal and Huawei for the past few months and never gotten and reply until I found out this email. I did report it to the game developer but they decided to only soft ban those people for 3 days and let them keep whatever they gotten for illegal third party recharge, which makes the game environment unfair for us paying the full price using legit recharge platform. Sent from my Huawei phone -------- Original message -------- From: xxxxx@xxxx.com Date: Thu, 1 Sep *****(PHONE), 3:21 pm To: xxxxx@xxxx.com Subject: RE : Refund request Dear Customer, Thank you for your reply. We have checked with our internal team the Huawei ID and all the transactions took place more than 14 days ago, and according to our internal policy we are unable to assist you with the refund. We advise you to report it to the developers and get a feedback from their side also because we understand precisely what you mean with illegal payment. Thank you for your understanding. If you have any further questions, please feel free to reply to this email thread and we will be happy to walk you through your doubts. Sincerely, Alexandru *****(PERSON) Customer Support team *****(PERSON) SE is a company incorporated under the laws of Ireland with its headquarters in Dublin, Ireland. *****(PERSON) SE is the provider of Huawei Mobile Services to Huawei and Honor device owners in *****(LOC), Canada, Australia, New Zealand and other countries. From : xxxxx@xxxx.com Sent : Thursday 01 September *****(PHONE) 13:52 To : xxxxx@xxxx.com Subject : Re: RE : Refund request Huawei ID: +*****(PHONE) Video of charge: https://youtube.com/shorts/NPpD0MzFgPg?feature=share On Thu, 1 Sept *****(PHONE) at 13:15, < xxxxx@xxxx.com> wrote: Dear Customer, Thank you for your reply. Unfortunately our internal tools do not allow access to folders from google drive. Could you please send them in another format? Also could you please provide us with you Huawei ID. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation. Sincerely, Alexandru *****(PERSON) Customer Support team *****(PERSON) SE is a company incorporated under the laws of Ireland with its headquarters in Dublin, Ireland. *****(PERSON) SE is the provider of Huawei Mobile Services to Huawei and Honor device owners in *****(LOC), Canada, Australia, New Zealand and other countries. From : xxxxx@xxxx.com Sent : Thursday 01 September *****(PHONE) 08:37 To : xxxxx@xxxx.com Subject : Re: RE : Refund request Screenshot_*****(PHONE)_*****(PHONE)_com.huawei.hwid.jpg SVID_*****(PHONE)_*****(PHONE)_1.mp4 On Wed, 31 Aug *****(PHONE) at 20:39, < xxxxx@xxxx.com> wrote: Dear Customer, Thank you for contacting *****(PERSON). We hope you’re doing well. I will do my very best to assist you. This email is regarding your refund request. In order to give you the best solution, please provide us with the following information: - A screenshot or record video of the charge - Your Huawei Id: App Gallery>HMS core>Open then take a screenshot If you have any further questions, please feel free to reply to this email thread and we will be happy to walk you through your doubts. Sincerely, Alexandru *****(PERSON) Customer Support team *****(PERSON) SE is a company incorporated under the laws of Ireland with its headquarters in Dublin, Ireland. *****(PERSON) SE is the provider of Huawei Mobile Services to Huawei and Honor device owners in *****(LOC), Canada, Australia, New Zealand and other countries. From : xxxxx@xxxx.com Sent : Wednesday 31 August *****(PHONE) 20:26 To : xxxxx@xxxx.com Subject : Refund request The game is allowing illegal third party transactions and it's not fair for players purchasing through legal and legit platforms to recharge. So I demand at least a partial refund from the app Kingdom Guard. *****(PHONE) *****(PHONE) *****(PHONE)

Interaction content: Stimate client, Vă mulțumim că ați contactat Aspiegel. Sperăm că vă simțiți bine. Pentru a vă oferi cea mai bună soluție, vă rugăm să specificați cererea dumneavoastră cu următoarele informații: 1. o descriere a problemei 2. o captură de ecran sau o înregistrare video a erorii 3. momentul în care a apărut problema 4. ID-ul tău Huawei: App Gallery>HMS core>Deschide și apoi fă o captură de ecran 5. Modelul telefonului dvs. 6. Numărul SN al dispozitivului dumneavoastră 7. Versiunea App Gallery: Huawei App Gallery>Me> About (Despre) 8. Versiunea HMS core: Huawei App Gallery>HMS core>Deschideți> Settings> About. 9. Aplicație conexă 10. versiunea aplicației aferente 11. jurnalul galeriei de aplicații Dacă aveți întrebări suplimentare, vă rugăm să răspundeți la acest mesaj de e-mail și vom fi bucuroși să vă ajutăm. Cu deosebită considerație, Andrea Aspiegel Customer Support team A Aspiegel SE é uma empresa constituída segundo as leis da Irlanda, com sede em Dublin, Irlanda. ID-ul dumneavoastra de Huawei: AppGallery>HMS core>Deschideți apoi faceți o captură de ecran. 5. Modelul telefonului dvs. 6. Numărul SN al dispozitivului dvs. 7. Interaction content: Dear customer, We hope you are doing well. We are bringing you an answer regarding your concern. After checks, it seemed that the VIP Campaign page had an issue which is fixed now. In this case, we advise you to click on AppGallery>Campaigns>VIP September Special CH and you will be able to find all the information and the Terms & Conditions at the end. In the Terms &Conditions it is specified: "5. How to Enter. 5.1 Any user who makes purchases by debit/credit card, direct carrier billing, or PayPal in all games that downloaded from AppGallery/ Game Center may opt to participate in the campaign. 5.2 This offer is only available to Huawei and other Android device users whose unique Huawei ID is registered within the Campaign territory stated in Section 3, where the Participant also resides. The participant's Huawei ID service region and IP address shall also correspond to their country of residence. " At the end of the campaign Terms & Conditions, you can also find the list of the games. If you have any further questions, please feel free to reply to this email thread and we will be happy to walk you through your doubts. Sincerely, Stela Aspiegel Customer Support team Aspiegel SE is a company incorporated under the laws of Ireland with its headquarters in Dublin, Ireland. Aspiegel SE is the provider of Huawei Mobile Services to Huawei and Honor device owners in *****(LOC), Canada, Australia, New Zealand and other countries. Interaction content: Estimado *****(PER), Gracias por contactar con Aspiegel. Espero que le vaya bien. Este correo electrónico es en relación con su preocupación sobre ''Compra en la aplicación no recibida''. Estoy encantado de asistirle con su problema y haré todo lo posible para ayudarle. ¿Quiere recibir el artículo comprado o un reembolso? Si quiere recibir el artículo: la mejor solución sería que usted se ponga en contacto con el servicio de atención al cliente del juego, ya que los desarrolladores son los únicos que pueden enviar los artículos directamente. Si quiere recibir un reembolso: Usted debería ponerse en contacto con el desarrollador de la aplicación en cuestión para acceptarle el reembolso por escrito. Hemos verificado en nuestro sistema que su cuenta de Huawei ID ha sido registrada en otro sitio. Por lo tanto, no tenemos acceso a la información de su cuenta. Tendrá que ponerse en contacto con el servicio de atención al cliente de su región. Por favor, acceda a este enlace https://consumer.huawei.com/en/support/contact-us/ y compruebe el servicio de atención al cliente de su país. Atentamente, *****(PER) Customer Support team Aspiegel SE is a company incorporated under the laws of *****(LOC) with its headquarters in *****(LOC), *****(LOC). Aspiegel SE is the provider of Huawei Mobile Services to Huawei and Honor device owners in Europe, Canada, *****(LOC), New Zealand and other countries. Interaction content: Dear customer, thank you for choosing *****(PERSON). We hope that you are doing well. I am glad to assist you with your inquiry and I will do my best to help you with your problem. Perform the following to troubleshoot: Clear the cache data of Google Play Store and Google Play services:（Note:This action will clear your Google account data. It is recommended that you back up the data before doing so. Open Settings, search for Apps, go to More > Show system processes, and touch Google Play Store. Then go to Storage > CLEAR DATA. Repeat the steps for Google Play services. Check whether your phone has a good network connection. It is recommended that you download the app in a good network environment. Check whether Digital balance/Student mode is enabled. If yes, open Settings, search for Digital balance or Student mode, disable it, and try again. Restart the device. Please do not hesitate to contact us if we can be your further assistance. With kind regards, Marian *****(PERSON) Customer Support team *****(PERSON) SE is a company incorporated under the laws of Ireland with its headquarters in Dublin, Ireland. *****(PERSON) SE is the provider of Huawei Mobile Services to Huawei and Honor device owners in *****(LOC), Canada, Australia, New Zealand and other countries. From : xxxxx@xxxx.com Sent : Wednesday 31 August *****(PHONE) 23:13 To : xxxxx@xxxx.com Subject : [AppGallery]Problems and suggestions am finding it very difficult to access my Google play Store up Sent from my HONOR phone

It is recommended that you back up the data before doing so. Open Settings, search for Apps, go to More > Show system processes, and touch Google Play Store. Then go to Storage > CLEAR DATA. Repeat the steps for Google Play services. Check whether your phone has a good network connection. It is recommended that you download the app in a good network environment. Check whether Digital balance/Student mode is enabled. If yes, open Settings, search for Digital balance or Student mode, disable it, and try again. Restart the device. Interaction content: Estimado cliente, Gracias por contactar con Aspiegel. Esperamos que le vaya bien. Este correo electrónico se refiere a su preocupación por los puntos Huawei. Paso 1: Por favor, verifique si ha pulsado el botón "Aceptar" durante el proceso de pago (lo que significa que acepta recibir el cashback en Puntos HUAWEI) Estos fueron los pasos que tuviste que seguir para aceptar recibir la devolución de Puntos HUAWEI: 1. Después de seleccionar el artículo que desea comprar, seleccione un método de pago. - Los métodos de pago que recompensarán al usuario con cashback tendrán una frase en color naranja que menciona "Recompensa en Puntos H.". 2. Cuando su pago se haya completado y haya sido exitoso, toque en "Aceptar" para aceptar su participación en la campaña. 3. Después de aceptar, pulse sobre "Hecho" para aceptar el cashback de la campaña. 4. Puede encontrar sus Puntos HUAWEI (después de seguir los pasos 1 a 3 anteriores) en los Ajustes del teléfono > Centro de cuentas > Puntos HUAWEI > Reclamación. Sus puntos deberían encontrarse en la pestaña Reclamado. Paso 2: Si ha pulsado el botón "Aceptar", envíenos los siguientes datos: 1. Su país de servicio. 2. La fecha en que realizó la(s) compra(s) 3. Envíenos las siguientes 3 capturas de pantalla de la página de puntos: una captura de pantalla de los puntos no reclamados  una captura de pantalla de los puntos reclamados  y una captura de pantalla de los puntos caducados. Nota: para encontrar estas páginas, vaya a: Ajustes del teléfono > Centro de cuentas > Puntos HUAWEI > Reclamación. 4. Indique el nombre de la campaña en la que participó. 5. Indique cuántos Puntos HUAWEI debía recibir. Si tiene alguna otra pregunta, no dude en responder a este hilo de correo electrónico y estaremos encantados de aclararle sus dudas. Atentamente, *****(PER) al Cliente Aspiegel SE es una sociedad constituida en virtud de la legislación de *****(LOC) con su sede en *****(LOC), *****(LOC). Aspiegel SE es el proveedor de servicios móviles de Huawei a los propietarios de dispositivos de Huawei y Honor en *****(LOC), *****(LOC), *****(LOC), *****(LOC) y otros países. Adjunto ticket de la compra Gracias y un saludo

Se non hai registrato l'indirizzo per la consegna del premio: Vai su AppGallery > Io > Premi > Altro e tocca "Indirizzo" per registrare il tuo indirizzo di spedizione e richiedere ufficialmente il premio. Uno screenshot dell'indirizzo di spedizione inviato con successo. NOTA: se il premio vinto non è elencato nella scheda "Altro", si prega di fornire le seguenti informazioni per ulteriori indagini: 1. ID HUAWEI (indirizzo e-mail/numero di telefono utilizzato per registrare l'ID Huawei). - Inviateci il paese del vostro account. 3. Descrivere il premio vinto. 4. Includere il nome della campagna a cui si è partecipato. 5. Se possibile, includete uno screenshot della notifica di vincita (dopo aver vinto il premio). In caso di ulteriori domande, non esitate a rispondere a questa e-mail e saremo lieti di assistervi. Interaction content: Dear *****(PERSON), I would like to follow up on the case you raised on 08/29/*****(PHONE). This email is regarding your concern about you physical price not being received. In order to better investigate this issue, we would kindly like to ask you for the following information: 1. Please send us the date you were contacted by the Customer Service team regarding the prize. 2. Send us your HUAWEI ID (your HUAWEI ID can be found by going to: phone Settings > Account center. Your HUAWEI ID will be at the top of the screen, right below your profile picture). 3. Send us your account country. 4. Outline the prize you won. 5. State the name of the campaign you participated in. 6. Provide a screenshot of the winning notification (after you won the prize), if possible. 7. A screenshot of the campaign you attended. If we do not hear from you within 48 hours, we will close this ticket. Once the ticket is closed, we will need to file a new ticket to receive further assistance which may cause delays in resolving the issue. Thank you for your understanding. If you have any further questions, please feel free to reply to this email thread and we will be happy to walk you through your doubts. Sincerely, Alexandru *****(PERSON) Customer Support team *****(PERSON) SE is a company incorporated under the laws of Ireland with its headquarters in Dublin, Ireland. *****(PERSON) SE is the provider of Huawei Mobile Services to Huawei and Honor device owners in *****(LOC), Canada, Australia, New Zealand and other countries. Interaction content: Dear *****(PERSON), Thank you for your patience and cooperation. Please follow the steps below: If the system keeps displaying a message indicating that the app is being installed, delete the downloaded app package or terminate the download task and try to install the app again. To delete the app package, open HUAWEI AppGallery, go to Me > Installation packages, and delete the package in question. To terminate the download task, open HUAWEI AppGallery, go to Me > Installation manager, and touch the download progress bar on the right of the app in question. Clear the cache of HUAWEI AppGallery and try to install the app from HUAWEI AppGallery again. (Refer to Step 4 in What should I do if I can't download an app in HUAWEI AppGallery? ) Check whether PrivateSpace has been enabled (by going to Settings > Privacy > PrivateSpace) or whether a sub user has been created (by going to Settings > Users & accounts). If so, disable it and try to install the app in question again. Restart your device, connect it to another network, and try to download and install the app again. The cause of '103 No certificate found' is the app may not be compatible with the device system. The suggestion in the FAQ is 'When you search for the app, check whether there is a tag indicating whether the app is compatible with your device. Download the app after confirming that it is compatible. Also, you can check and update your HMS Core by going to settings> HMS Core> Check for updates. We apologise for any inconvenience this process may cause. Should you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us by replying to this e-mail. Sincerely, Madalin *****(PERSON) Customer Support team *****(PERSON) SE is a company incorporated under the laws of Ireland with its headquarters in Dublin, Ireland. *****(PERSON) SE is the provider of Huawei Mobile Services to Huawei and Honor device owners in *****(LOC), Canada, Australia, New Zealand and other countries. Atenciosamente, Madalin Aspiegel Customer Support team A Aspiegel SE é uma empresa constituída segundo as leis da Irlanda, com sede em Dublin, Irlanda. Interaction content: Dear *****(PERSON), Thank you for contacting *****(PERSON). We hope you’re doing well. This email is regarding your concern about the unknown charge on your account. I'll be more than happy to assist you with your inquiry. In this email, I will provide you with the necessary steps. If you run into any issues while following the steps, please keep reading as you will also find below the information we require from you to be able to investigate. If you don’t provide us the necessary information, we may not be able to help you further. The charges you received are likely to be related to a Company service or subscription you have signed up for. If you would like to cancel your subscription, please follow the guideline below: At the moment we do not have the necessary permission to cancel subscriptions on behalf of our users, but I will gladly walk you through the process on how to cancel it. · If you still have a Company phone, you can access cancel all your subscriptions by following these steps: Settings > Account center > Payments & purchases > Subscriptions. Choose the subscription you want to cancel and tap Cancel Subscription. Once the subscription has been canceled, your account will not be charged from the next month onwards. · If you don’t have a Company phone anymore, you can manage all your subscriptions on our online portal following these steps: Go to https://id7.cloud.Company.com/CAS/portal/login.html > Log in > Account Center > Payment and purchases > Subscriptions/Password-free payments and click Remove. If you will access our online portal through your phone's browser, please enable first the desktop site, so you will be able to see the "Payment and Purchases" window. If, for any reason, you need further assistance with your inquiry, please send us the following information: 1. You Company ID (Phone number include country code/ Email address): 2. Your request: eg. Cancel Company Cloud subscription/ Cancel Company Music subscriptions/ Cancel Company video subscriptions 3. Proof of transactions: a) If the payment was made with your Bank card Copy of your bank statement showing the charges from *****(PERSON) SE and the last 4 digits of your bank card. b) If the payment was made with your PayPal a. A screenshot of payment with transaction invoice number available c) If the payment was made with your Phone The phone number get charged A screenshot of phone bill showing the charges from *****(PERSON) SE We hope this information is useful and it solves your issue. For further questions, please feel free to reply to this email thread and we will be happy to walk you through your doubts. Sincerely, Madalin *****(PERSON) Customer Support team *****(PERSON) SE is a company incorporated under the laws of Ireland with its headquarters in Dublin, Ireland. *****(PERSON) SE is the provider of Company Mobile Services to Company and Honor device owners in *****(LOC), Canada, Australia, New Zealand and other countries. The charges you received are likely to be related to a Company service or subscription you have signed up for. Judging by the price, this is likely a Company Cloud Subscription. If you would like to cancel your subscription, please follow the guideline below: From your computer, access the official website: login to https://id7.cloud.Company.com/CAS/portal/login.html and go to Payment and purchases > Subscriptions/Password-free payments and touch Remove. Please be aware that if you access the online portal with your Phone, you should first activate the desktop version of the browser. If the subscription disappears from your account, it indicates that it has been canceled successfully. Once canceled, no deduction will be made from your account from the following month onward. Sincerely, Madalin Company Customer Support team Company SE is a company incorporated under the laws of Ireland with its headquarters in Dublin, Ireland. Interaction content: Sehr geehrter Kunde, vielen Dank, dass Sie mit *****(PER) Kontakt aufgenommen haben. Wir hoffen, dass es Ihnen gut geht. In dieser E-Mail geht es um Ihr Anliegen, Ihre Company-ID zu löschen und Ihr Abonnement zu kündigen. Keine Sorge, ich verstehe Ihr Anliegen sehr gut und ich werde mein Bestes tun, um Ihnen die bestmögliche Lösung zu bieten. Leider ist es uns aufgrund der Datenschutzbestimmungen nicht gestattet, Konten und Abonnements im Namen unserer Kunden zu löschen. Sie können sich jedoch jederzeit abmelden, indem Sie die folgenden Schritte ausführen: Über Ihr Company-Handy: Einstellungen > Kontocenter > Zahlung und Einkäufe > Abonnements und tippen Sie auf den Dienst, dessen Abonnement Sie kündigen möchten. Greifen Sie von Ihrem Computer aus auf die offizielle Website zu: Melden Sie sich auf https://id7.cloud.Company.com/CAS/portal/login.html an und gehen Sie zu Konto & Sicherheit > Zahlung und Einkäufe > Abonnements/Passwortlose Zahlungen und tippen Sie auf Entfernen. Bitte beachten Sie, dass Sie, wenn Sie die Website von Ihrem Handy aus aufrufen, die Desktop-Version aktivieren müssen, damit die Registerkarte Zahlungen und Einkäufe angezeigt wird. Wenn das Abonnement aus Ihrem Konto verschwindet, bedeutet dies, dass es erfolgreich gekündigt wurde. Nach der Kündigung wird ab dem nächsten Monat nichts mehr von Ihrem Konto abgebucht. Wenn Sie weitere Hilfe benötigen, stellen Sie uns bitte die folgenden Informationen zur Verfügung, damit wir Ihr Konto überprüfen und weitere Informationen über das Abonnement bereitstellen können: 1. Ihre Company-ID (Telefonnummer mit Landesvorwahl/E-Mail-Adresse): 2. Ihr Anliegen: z.B. Company Cloud Abonnement kündigen/ Company Musik Abonnement kündigen/ Company Video Abonnement kündigen 3. Nachweis der Transaktionen: a) Wenn die Zahlung mit Ihrer Bankkarte erfolgt ist: - Kopie Ihres Kontoauszugs mit den Abbuchungen von *****(PER) SE und den letzten 4 Ziffern Ihrer Bankkarte. b) Wenn die Zahlung mit Ihrem PayPal erfolgt ist: - Ein Screenshot der Zahlung mit der Nummer der Transaktionsrechnung liegt vor c) Wenn die Zahlung mit Ihrem Telefon erfolgt ist: - Die Telefonnummer, die belastet wurde - Ein Screenshot der Telefonrechnung, der die Gebühren von *****(PER) SE zeigt Wenn Sie Ihre Company ID nicht mehr benötigen, können Sie sie löschen. Nachdem Sie Ihre Company ID gelöscht haben, werden Ihre persönlichen Daten auf dem Server bereinigt und können nicht wiederhergestellt werden. Ihre persönlichen Daten in den Sicherungs- und Protokolldateien des Servers werden innerhalb von sechs Monaten automatisch bereinigt. Um ein Konto zu löschen, gehen Sie zu Einstellungen > Anmelden mit Company ID > Datenschutzzentrum > Konto löschen. Wenn das Konto ein Unterkonto hat, verwenden Sie bitte zuerst das Unterkonto, um sich anzumelden, und löschen Sie das Unterkonto. Löschen Sie dann das Hauptkonto. Wenn "Konto löschen" nicht angezeigt wird, gehen Sie zum Google Play Store, um Company Mobile Services zu aktualisieren, die offizielle Company-App für Company ID. Benutzer können das Konto auch über das Webportal löschen. Loggen Sie sich zunächst unter der unten angegebenen URL ein und klicken Sie auf Einstellungen in der oberen rechten Ecke. Scrollen Sie auf der Seite nach unten, bis "Konto löschen" angezeigt wird. Klicken Sie auf , um das Passwort einzugeben und das Konto zu löschen. https://hwid7.vmall.com/CAS/portal/loginAuth.html?validated=true&themeName=red&service=https%3A%2F%2Fhwid7.vmall.com%2FCAS%2Fportal%2FuserCenter%2Findex.html&loginChannel=*****(PHONE)&reqClientType=39&lang=en-us&countryCode=de Wir würden uns sehr über Ihr Feedback zu unserem E-Mail-Austausch freuen, da wir Ihren Input benötigen, um unseren Service weiter zu verbessern. Wir laden Sie daher ein, die Umfrage auszufüllen, die Sie in Kürze über die E-Mail-Adresse erhalten werden, die Sie zur Kontaktaufnahme mit uns verwendet haben. Wenn Sie weitere Fragen haben, können Sie gerne auf diesen E-Mail-Thread antworten, und wir werden Ihnen gerne weiterhelfen. Mit freundlichen Grüßen, Andrea *****(PER) Customer Support team *****(PER) SE is a company incorporated under the laws of *****(LOC) with its headquarters in *****(LOC), *****(LOC). *****(PER) SE is the provider of Company Mobile Services to Company and Honor device owners in Europe, Canada, *****(LOC), New Zealand and other countries. Wenn das Konto ein Unterkonto hat, verwenden Sie bitte zuerst das Unterkonto, um sich anzumelden, und löschen Sie das Unterkonto. Löschen Sie dann das Hauptkonto. Wenn "Konto löschen" nicht angezeigt wird, gehen Sie zum Google Play Store, um Company Mobile Services zu aktualisieren, die offizielle Company-App für Company ID. Benutzer können das Konto auch über das Webportal löschen. Loggen Sie sich zunächst unter der unten angegebenen URL ein und klicken Sie auf Einstellungen in der oberen rechten Ecke. Scrollen Sie auf der Seite nach unten, bis "Konto löschen" angezeigt wird. Klicken Sie auf , um das Passwort einzugeben und das Konto zu löschen. https://hwid7.vmall.com/CAS/portal/loginAuth.html?validated=true&themeName=red&service=https%3A%2F%2Fhwid7.vmall.com%2FCAS%2Fportal%2FuserCenter%2Findex.html&loginChannel=*****(PHONE)&reqClientType=39&lang=en-us&countryCode=de Wir würden uns sehr über Ihr Feedback zu unserem E-Mail-Austausch freuen, da wir Ihren Input benötigen, um unseren Service weiter zu verbessern. Wir laden Sie daher ein, die Umfrage auszufüllen, die Sie in Kürze über die E-Mail-Adresse erhalten werden, die Sie zur Kontaktaufnahme mit uns verwendet haben. Wenn Sie weitere Fragen haben, können Sie gerne auf diesen E-Mail-Thread antworten, und wir werden Ihnen gerne weiterhelfen. Mit freundlichen Grüßen, Andrea *****(PER) Customer Support team *****(PER) SE is a company incorporated under the laws of *****(LOC) with its headquarters in *****(LOC), *****(LOC). *****(PER) SE is the provider of Company Mobile Services to Company and Honor device owners in Europe, Canada, *****(LOC), New Zealand and other countries.

Please follow these steps: Go to phone Settings > Account centre > Payment and purchases > Purchase history and check if this payment is listed in the purchase history or not. Then please send us the following information so that we can proceed with an investigation: · Whether the payment is listed or not in the purchase history · Send us your Company ID (your Company ID can be found by going to: phone Settings > Account centre. Interaction content: Hallo *****(PER), geben Sie mir bitte mal eine richtige URL an. Keiner der uns bekannten Zugänge (ID, Kundencenter, Cloud) weist eine derartige Menüstruktur auf. Abonennements leer, und nirgends sind Zahlungen oder Rechnungen sichtbar Kundencenter, wo wir die Geräte bestellen unter der Company ID, auch nichts mehr. Viele Grüße / Best Regards InfoTech GmbH - Informatik Service Provider *****(PER) xxxxx@xxxx.com www.InfoTech-ISP.net Pommernstraße 4 *****(PHONE) Holzminden fon: +49 *****(PHONE) *****(PHONE)-0 fax: +49 *****(PHONE) *****(PHONE)-20 HRB *****(PHONE) – Amtsgericht Hildesheim USt.-ID: DE 243 337 879, EORI DE*****(PHONE) Geschäftsführung: *****(PER). *****(PER) Disclaimer Diese e-Mail und eventuelle Anhänge ist ausschließlich für die adressierte Person bestimmt und könnte vertrauliche und / oder rechtlich geschützte Information enthalten. Wenn Sie nicht der richtige Adressat sind und/ oder diese e-Mail irrtümlich erhalten haben, informieren Sie bitte sofort den Absender und vernichten diese Mail. Es ist Ihnen in diesem Fall auch nicht gestattet, diese e-Mail teilweise oder ganz zu lesen, zu kopieren, an Unbefugte weiterzuleiten oder anderweitig für sich selbst zu verwenden. Widersprechen Sie nicht, gehen wir davon aus, dass Sie einverstanden sind, dass wir mit Ihnen über das Internet per E-Mail korrespondieren. Unbeschadet dessen ist allein die von uns unterzeichnete schriftliche Fassung verbindlich. Wir weisen darauf hin, dass derartige Nachrichten mit und ohne Zutun von Dritten verloren gehen, verändert oder verfälscht werden können. Auch ist die Vertraulichkeit unter Umständen nicht gewahrt. Wir haften deshalb nicht für die Unversehrtheit von E-Mails nachdem sie unseren Herrschaftsbereich verlassen haben und können Ihnen hieraus entstehende Schäden nicht ersetzen. Infotech behält sich das Recht vor, e-mail Kommunikation durch ihre Netze zu verfolgen. Sollte trotz der von uns verwendeten Virus-Schutz-Programme durch die Zusendung von E-Mails ein Virus in Ihre Systeme gelangen, haften wir nicht für eventuell hieraus entstehende Schäden. From: xxxxx@xxxx.com Sent: Thursday, September 1, *****(PHONE) 4:57 PM To: xxxxx@xxxx.com Subject: Rechnung brauchen Sehr geehrter Herrn *****(PER), ich bedanke mich Ihnen für Ihre Geduld in dieses lange Prozess und ich entschuldige mich Ihnen für den Wartenzeit. Unser internes Team sagte mir, dass Sie Ihre Rechnung sehen und herunterladen können, wenn Sie dem Pfad folgen. Aber wie auch immer, die Verfügbarkeit der Rechnung sollte 1 Jahr sein. Gehen zu Einstellungen > Kontocenter > Zahlungen und Einkäufe > Kaufhistorie, tippen Sie auf die entsprechende Bestellung und dann auf RECHNUNG ANFORDERN. Füllen Sie alle erforderlichen Felder aus. Bestätigen Sie die eingegebenen Informationen und klicken Sie auf √ in der oberen rechten Ecke, um Ihre Anfrage zu senden. Zörgen Sie nicht, uns anzusprechen, falls wir Ihnen weiter darin behilflich sein können. Mit freundlichem Gruß, *****(PER) Company Kundenservice Die Company SE ist eine Gesellschaft nach irischem Recht mit Sitz in *****(LOC), *****(LOC). Company SE ist der Anbieter von Company Mobile Services für Company- und Honor-Gerätebesitzer in *****(LOC), *****(LOC), *****(LOC), *****(LOC) und anderen Ländern. From : xxxxx@xxxx.com Sent : Thursday 01 September *****(PHONE) 16:10 Subject : RE: Rechnung brauchen Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, Sie können also meiner Bitte nach einer Rechnung aus dem Vormonat nicht nachkommen. Ein zahlungsfähiger Einzug ohne Rechnungslegung ist natürlich völlig inakzeptabel. Das gleiche gilt für die 48h Haltefrist, hier gelten in der EU deutlich längere Aufbewahrungsfristen für Belege der Leistungserbringung. Welche Maßnahmen haben Sie getroffen für den Fall, dass die 48h überschritten werden? Company SE ist die leistungsfakturiende Stelle des Produktes „Company Mobile Cloud“, deren Vertretung Sie hier darstellen? Sie dürfen gern anonym bleiben. Interaction content: Dear *****(PERSON), Thank you for contacting *****(PERSON). We hope you’re doing well. This email is regarding your concern about Cancelling your subscription/payment. I'll be more than happy to assist you with your inquiry. If you are being charged a monthly amount from your bank account, it means that you may have an active subscription now or you have accessed the free trial of some application in the past, after which, once the trial period has passed, you have started to be charged a monthly fee. We do not have the necessary permission to cancel subscriptions on behalf of our users, but I will gladly walk you through the process on how to cancel it. Go to https://id7.cloud.Company.com/CAS/portal/login.html > Log in > Account Center > Payment and purchases > Subscriptions/Password-free payments and click Remove. If you will access our online portal through your phone's browser, please enable first the desktop site, so you will be able to see the "Payment and Purchases" window. If, for any reason, you need further assistance with your inquiry, please send us the following information: 1. You Company ID (Phone number include country code/ Email address): 2. Proof of transactions: a) If the payment was made with your Bank card Copy of your bank statement showing the charges from *****(PERSON) SE and the last 4 digits of your bank card. b) If the payment was made with your PayPal A screenshot of payment with transaction invoice number available ID starting with P*****(PHONE).. c) If the payment was made with your Phone The phone number get charged A screenshot of phone bill showing the charges from *****(PERSON) SE We hope this information is useful and it solves your issue. For further questions, please feel free to reply to this email thread and we will be happy to walk you through your doubts. Also, we would greatly appreciate your feedback regarding our email exchange, as we need your input to keep improving our service. Therefore, we invite you to fill in the survey that will soon arrive on the email address you used to contact us. Sincerely, Cristiana *****(PERSON) Customer Support team *****(PERSON) SE is a company incorporated under the laws of Ireland with its headquarters in Dublin, Ireland. *****(PERSON) SE is the provider of Company Mobile Services to Company and Honor device owners in *****(LOC), Canada, Australia, New Zealand and other countries. Interaction content: Dear customer, Thank you for contacting *****(PERSON). We hope you are doing well. I would be more than happy to assist you with your inquiry. Based on our understanding, your issue related to canceling a subscription. Unfortunately, we do not have the necessary permission to cancel subscriptions on behalf of our users, due to privacy concerns. I will provide you with the cancellation steps, but if you run into any issues while following them you will also find below what information we require from you to be able to investigate From your computer, access the official website: login to https://id7.cloud.Company.com/CAS/portal/login.html and go to Payment and purchases > Subscriptions/Password-free payments and touch Remove. Please note that if you access the website from your phone, you must enable desktop version for the Payment and purchases tab to show up. If the subscription disappears from your account, it indicates that it has been canceled successfully. Once canceled, no deduction will be made from your account from the following month onward. If you need further assistance, please provide us the following information, to investigate your account and provide more information around the subscription: 1. Your Company ID (Phone number include country code/ Email address): 2. Proof of transactions: a) If the payment was made with your Bank card: Copy of your bank statement showing the charges from *****(PERSON) SE and the last 4 digits of your bank card. b) If the payment was made with your PayPal: A screenshot of payment with transaction invoice number available c) If the payment was made with your Phone: The phone number get charged A screenshot of phone bill showing the charges from *****(PERSON) SE If you have any further questions, please feel free to reply to this email thread and we will be happy to walk you through your doubts. Thank you very much for your understanding. Sincerely, Alexandra *****(PERSON) Customer Support team *****(PERSON) SE is a company incorporated under the laws of Ireland with its headquarters in Dublin, Ireland. *****(PERSON) SE is the provider of Company Mobile Services to Company and Honor device owners in *****(LOC), Canada, Australia, New Zealand and other countries. Interaction content: Sehr geehrter Kunde, vielen Dank, dass Sie sich für Company entschieden haben. Wir hoffen, dass es Ihnen gut geht. Diese e-Mail bezieht sich auf Ihr Anliegen, das Abonnement kündigen. Keine Sorge, ich verstehe Ihr Anliegen sehr gut und ich werde mein Bestes tun, um Ihnen die bestmögliche Lösung anzubieten! Aufgrund der Datenschutzbestimmungen ist es uns nicht gestattet, Konten und Abonnements im Namen unserer Kunden zu löschen. Sie können sich jedoch jederzeit abmelden, indem Sie die nachstehenden Schritte ausführen: Über Ihr Company-Handy:Einstellungen > Kontocenter > Zahlung und Einkäufe > Abonnements und tippen Sie auf den Dienst,dessen Abonnement Sie kündigen möchten. Gehen Sie von Ihrem Computer aus auf die offizielle Website: Melden Sie sich auf https://id7.cloud.Company.com/CAS/portal/login.html an und dann können Sie zu Zahlungen und Einkäufe > Abonnements/Passwortfreie Zahlungen und tippen Sie auf Entfernen. Nach der Kündigung wird ab dem nächsten Monat nichts mehr von Ihrem Konto abgebucht. A screenshot of payment with transaction invoice number available ID starting with P*****(PHONE).. c) If the payment was made with your Phone The phone number get charged A screenshot of phone bill showing the charges from *****(PERSON) SE After that we will contact our internal team and get back to you as soon as possible. Also, please note that if you don’t have a Company phone anymore, you can manage all your subscriptions on our online portal following these steps: Go to https://id7.cloud.Company.com/CAS/portal/login.html > Log in > Account Center > Payment and purchases > Subscriptions/Password-free payments and click Remove. If you will access our online portal through your phone's browser, please enable the desktop site, so you will be able to see the "Payment and Purchases" window. For further questions, please feel free to reply to this email thread and we will be happy to walk you through your doubts. Interaction content: Dear Customer, Thank you for contacting *****(PERSON). We hope you’re doing well. This email is regarding your concern about the unknown charges. I'll be more than happy to assist you with your inquiry, and I will do my absolute best to help. The charges you received are likely to be related to a Company service or subscription you have signed up for. Judging by the price, this is likely a Company Cloud Subscription. If you would like to cancel your subscription, please follow the guideline below: From your Company phone: Settings > Account center > Payment and purchases > Subscriptions and tap the service you wish to cancel the subscription for. From your computer, access the official website: login to https://id7.cloud.Company.com/CAS/portal/login.html and go to Payment and purchases > Subscriptions/Password-free payments and touch Remove. Please be aware that if you access the online portal with your Phone, you should first activate the desktop version of the browser. If the subscription disappears from your account, it indicates that it has been canceled successfully. Once canceled, no deduction will be made from your account from the following month onward. If you need further assistance, please provide us the following information, to investigate your account and provide more information around the subscription: 1. Your Company ID (Phone number include country code/ Email address) 2. Your request: e.g., Cancel Company Cloud subscription/ Cancel Company Music subscription/ Cancel Company video subscription. 3. Proof of transactions: a) If the payment was made with your Bank card: Copy of your bank statement showing the charges from *****(PERSON) SE and the last 4 digits of your bank card. b) If the payment was made with your PayPal: A screenshot of payment with transaction invoice number available. c) If the payment was made with your Phone: The phone number get charged. A screenshot of phone bill showing the charges from *****(PERSON) SE. If you have any further questions, please feel free to reply to this email thread and we will be happy to walk you through your doubts. We would greatly appreciate your feedback regarding our email exchange, as we need your input to keep improving our service. Therefore, we invite you to fill in the survey that will soon arrive on the email address you used to contact us. Sincerely, Ramon *****(PERSON) Customer Support team *****(PERSON) SE is a company incorporated under the laws of Ireland with its headquarters in Dublin, Ireland. *****(PERSON) SE is the provider of Company Mobile Services to Company and Honor device owners in *****(LOC), Canada, Australia, New Zealand and other countries. From : xxxxx@xxxx.com Sent : Thursday 01 September *****(PHONE) 13:21 To : xxxxx@xxxx.com Subject : Unknown payment Could you please tell me what this payment is for. Thank you.

Questa e-mail è in risposta alla sua richiesta di cancellazione di un abbonamento e richiesta di rimborso. Sono più che lieta di assisterla nella sua richiesta e farò del mio meglio per aiutarla a risolvere il suo problema. Se le viene addebitato un importo mensile sul suo conto bancario, significa che forse ha un abbonamento attivo o che in passato ha avuto accesso alla prova gratuita di qualche applicazione, dopodiché, una volta trascorso il periodo di prova, ha iniziato a vedersi addebitare un costo mensile. Se non possiede più un telefono Company, è possibile gestire tutti gli abbonamenti sul nostro portale online seguendo i seguenti passaggi: Accedere a https://id7.cloud.Company.com/CAS/portal/login.html > Accedere > Account Center > Pagamenti e acquisti > Abbonamenti/Pagamenti senza password e fare clic su Rimuovi. Se accedete al nostro portale online tramite il browser del vostro telefono, attivate prima la modalità desktop, in modo da poter vedere la finestra "Pagamenti e acquisti". Per la richiesta di rimborso la preghiamo di inviarci le seguenti informazioni: 1. Il suo ID Company (numero di telefono comprensivo di prefisso nazionale/indirizzo e-mail) 2. Prova delle transazioni: ⦁ Se il pagamento è stato effettuato con la carta di credito: copia dell'estratto conto bancario che riporta gli addebiti effettuati da *****(PER) SE e le ultime 4 cifre della carta di credito. ⦁ Se il pagamento è stato effettuato con PayPal: una schermata del pagamento con il numero di fattura della transazione disponibile. ⦁ Se il pagamento è stato effettuato con il telefono: il numero di telefono addebitato e una schermata della bolletta telefonica che mostri gli addebiti da parte di *****(PER) SE. Per ulteriori domande, non esiti a rispondere a questa e-mail e saremo lieti di aiutarla a risolvere i suoi dubbi. Per la richiesta di rimborso la preghiamo di inviarci le seguenti informazioni: 1. Il suo ID Company (numero di telefono comprensivo di prefisso nazionale/indirizzo e-mail) 2. Questa e-mail è in risposta alla sua richiesta di cancellazione di un abbonamento e richiesta di rimborso. Sono più che lieta di assisterla nella sua richiesta e farò del mio meglio per aiutarla a risolvere il suo problema. Se le viene addebitato un importo mensile sul suo conto bancario, significa che forse ha un abbonamento attivo o che in passato ha avuto accesso alla prova gratuita di qualche applicazione, dopodiché, una volta trascorso il periodo di prova, ha iniziato a vedersi addebitare un costo mensile. Purtroppo non abbiamo l'autorizzazione necessaria per cancellare gli abbonamenti per conto dei nostri utenti per motivi di privacy, ma sarò lieta di illustrarle la procedura di cancellazione. Se accedete al nostro portale online tramite il browser del vostro telefono, attivate prima la modalità desktop, in modo da poter vedere la finestra "Pagamenti e acquisti". Per la richiesta di rimborso la preghiamo di inviarci le seguenti informazioni: 1. Il suo ID Company (numero di telefono comprensivo di prefisso nazionale/indirizzo e-mail) 2. Interaction content: Dear Customer, Thank you for contacting *****(PERSON). We hope you’re doing well. This email is regarding your concern about cancelling your Subscription. Due to privacy concerns, we do not have the necessary permission to cancel subscriptions on behalf of our users, but I will do my absolute best to assist you with your inquiry by providing you the cancellation steps, but if you run into any issues while following them you will also find below what information we require from you to be able to investigate. Please follow the next guideline to solve your issue: From your computer, access the official website: login to https://id7.cloud.Company.com/CAS/portal/login.html and go to Payment and purchases > Subscriptions/Password-free payments and touch Remove. Please note that if you access the website from your phone, you must enable desktop version for the Payment and purchases tab to show up. If the subscription disappears from your account, it indicates that it has been cancelled successfully. Once cancelled, no deduction will be made from your account from the following month onward. If you need further assistance, please provide us the following information, to investigate your account and provide more information around the subscription: 1. Your Company ID (Phone number include country code/ Email address) 2. Your request: e.g., Cancel Company Cloud subscription/ Cancel Company Music subscription/ Cancel Company video subscription. 3. Proof of transactions: a) If the payment was made with your Bank card: Copy of your bank statement showing the charges from *****(PERSON) SE and the last 4 digits of your bank card. b) If the payment was made with your PayPal: A screenshot of payment with transaction invoice number available. c) If the payment was made with your Phone: The phone number get charged. A screenshot of phone bill showing the charges from *****(PERSON) SE. We would greatly appreciate your feedback regarding our email exchange, as we need your input to keep improving our service. Therefore, we invite you to fill in the survey that will soon arrive on the email address you used to contact us. If you have any further questions, please feel free to reply to this email thread and we will be happy to walk you through your doubts. Interaction content: Bonjour *****(PER), Merci d’avoir contacté Company. Nous espérons que vous allez bien. Ce courriel fait suite à votre requête concernant comment annuler un abonnement. Si vous êtes facturée pour un abonnement à un produit Company, cela signifie que vous vous y êtes abonnée par le passé ou que vous avez souscrit un essai gratuit que vous avez oublié de désactiver. Si vous souhaitez l'annuler, veuillez suivre une des méthodes ci-dessous : 1. Depuis votre téléphone Company: accédez aux Paramètres > Mon compte > Paiement et achats > Abonnements et tapez sur le service pour lequel vous souhaitez annuler l’abonnement. 2. Depuis votre ordinateur, accédez au site officiel: connectez-vous à https://id7.cloud.Company.com/CAS/portal/login.html et allez dans Paiement et achats > Abonnements/Paiements sans mot de passe et touchez Supprimer. Veuillez noter que si vous accédez au site web depuis votre téléphone, vous devez activer la version de bureau pour que l'onglet "Paiement et achats" s'affiche. Si l'abonnement disparaît de votre compte, cela signifie qu'il a été annulé avec succès. *****(LOC) fois annulé, aucune déduction ne sera effectuée sur votre compte à partir du mois suivant. Si vous avez besoin d'une assistance supplémentaire, veuillez nous fournir les informations suivantes, afin de vérifier votre compte et fournir plus d'informations sur l'abonnement: - Votre identifiant Company (Numéro de téléphone avec indicatif du pays/adresse électronique) - Preuve des transactions: 1: Si le paiement a été effectué avec votre carte bancaire : une copie de votre relevé bancaire montrant les frais de Company SE et les 4 derniers chiffres de votre carte bancaire. 2: Si le paiement a été effectué avec votre PayPal : une capture d'écran du paiement avec le numéro de facture disponible (ça commence par P*****(PHONE)...) 3: Si le paiement a été effectué avec votre téléphone : le numéro de téléphone facturé et une capture d'écran de la facture de téléphone montrant les frais de Company SE. Pour d’autres questions, n’hésitez pas à répondre à ce fil de discussion et nous serons heureux de vous guider à travers vos doutes. Nous apprécierions beaucoup aussi vos commentaires concernant notre échange d'e-mails, car nous avons besoin de votre avis pour continuer à améliorer notre service. Nous vous invitons donc à remplir le questionnaire qui arrivera bientôt sur l'adresse électronique que vous avez utilisée pour nous contacter. Cordialement, Stela L'équipe d'assistance à la clientèle d'Company Company SE is a company incorporated under the laws of *****(LOC) with its headquarters in Dublin, *****(LOC). Si vous souhaitez l'annuler, veuillez suivre une des méthodes ci-dessous : 1. Depuis votre téléphone Company: accédez aux Paramètres > Mon compte > Paiement et achats > Abonnements et tapez sur le service pour lequel vous souhaitez annuler l’abonnement. 2. Depuis votre ordinateur, accédez au site officiel: connectez-vous à https://id7.cloud.Company.com/CAS/portal/login.html et allez dans Paiement et achats > Abonnements/Paiements sans mot de passe et touchez Supprimer. Veuillez noter que si vous accédez au site web depuis votre téléphone, vous devez activer la version de bureau pour que l'onglet "Paiement et achats" s'affiche. Si l'abonnement disparaît de votre compte, cela signifie qu'il a été annulé avec succès. *****(LOC) fois annulé, aucune déduction ne sera effectuée sur votre compte à partir du mois suivant. Si vous avez besoin d'une assistance supplémentaire, veuillez nous fournir les informations suivantes, afin de vérifier votre compte et fournir plus d'informations sur l'abonnement: - Votre identifiant Company (Numéro de téléphone avec indicatif du pays/adresse électronique) - Preuve des transactions: 1: Si le paiement a été effectué avec votre carte bancaire : une copie de votre relevé bancaire montrant les frais de Company SE et les 4 derniers chiffres de votre carte bancaire. 2: Si le paiement a été effectué avec votre PayPal : une capture d'écran du paiement avec le numéro de facture disponible (ça commence par P*****(PHONE)...) 3: Si le paiement a été effectué avec votre téléphone : le numéro de téléphone facturé et une capture d'écran de la facture de téléphone montrant les frais de Company SE. Pour d’autres questions, n’hésitez pas à répondre à ce fil de discussion et nous serons heureux de vous guider à travers vos doutes. Nous apprécierions beaucoup aussi vos commentaires concernant notre échange d'e-mails, car nous avons besoin de votre avis pour continuer à améliorer notre service. Nous vous invitons donc à remplir le questionnaire qui arrivera bientôt sur l'adresse électronique que vous avez utilisée pour nous contacter. Interaction content: Dear *****(PERSON), Thank you for contacting *****(PERSON). We hope you’re doing well. This email is regarding your concern about the unknown charges. The charges you received are likely to be related to a Company service or subscription you have signed up for. Due to privacy concerns, we do not have the necessary permission to cancel subscriptions or delete accounts on behalf of our users, but I will do my absolute best to assist you with your inquiry by providing you the cancellation steps, but if you run into any issues while following them you will also find below what information we require from you to be able to investigate. If you would like to cancel your subscription, please follow the guideline below: From your Company phone: Settings > Account center > Payment and purchases > Subscriptions and tap the service you wish to cancel the subscription for. From your computer, access the official website: login to https://id7.cloud.Company.com/CAS/portal/login.html and go to Payment and purchases > Subscriptions/Password-free payments and touch Remove. Please be aware that if you access the online portal with your Phone, you should first activate the desktop version of the browser. If the subscription disappears from your account, it indicates that it has been canceled successfully. Once canceled, no deduction will be made from your account from the following month onward. If you need further assistance, please provide us the following information, to investigate your account and provide more information around the subscription: 1. Your Company ID (Phone number include country code/ Email address): 2. Your request: e.g., Cancel Company Cloud subscription/ Cancel Company Music subscription/ Cancel Company video subscription 3. Proof of transactions: a) If the payment was made with your Bank card: Copy of your bank statement showing the charges from *****(PERSON) SE and the last 4 digits of your bank card. b) If the payment was made with your PayPal: A screenshot of payment with transaction invoice number available c) If the payment was made with your Phone: The phone number get charged A screenshot of phone bill showing the charges from *****(PERSON) SE If you have any further questions, please feel free to reply to this email thread and we will be happy to walk you through your doubts. We would greatly appreciate your feedback regarding our email exchange, as we need your input to keep improving our service. Therefore, we invite you to fill in the survey that will soon arrive on the email address you used to contact us. Sincerely, Claudiu *****(PERSON) Customer Support team *****(PERSON) SE is a company incorporated under the laws of Ireland with its headquarters in Dublin, Ireland. *****(PERSON) SE is the provider of Company Mobile Services to Company and Honor device owners in *****(LOC), Canada, Australia, New Zealand and other countries. Interaction content: Gentile *****(PER), Grazie per aver contattato *****(PER). Vorremmo informarla che gli addebiti non sono collegati al suo ID Company. Si prega di mettersi in contatto con la banca che ha emesso la carta di credito per ulteriore assistenza, dal momento che sono state rilevate attività sospette. Nel frattempo abbiamo rimborsato 15x20 euro x2 e 4,56 Euro x2, lei ricevera' il denaro sul suo conto entro 10 giorni lavorativi. Se dovessi avere ulteriori domande, contattaci rispondendo a questa e-mail: saremo lieti di aiutarti. Cordiali saluti, *****(PER) Il tuo team ad Company *****(PER) SE è una società costituita secondo le leggi irlandesi con sede a *****(LOC), *****(LOC).*****(PER) SE è il fornitore di servizi mobili Company per i proprietari di dispositivi Company e Honor in *****(LOC), *****(LOC), *****(LOC), *****(LOC) e altri paesi. From : xxxxx@xxxx.com Sent : Wednesday 31 August *****(PHONE) 20:10 To : xxxxx@xxxx.com Subject : R: RE : *****(PER) Support issue submit Non risultano abbonamenti attivi e tanto meno transazioni effettuate , ma come si evince dall' estratto conto allegato in data 28/8 *****(PER) ha addebitato sul mio conto 4 importi nell' arco di 30 min. pari a 40 � circa, inoltre sulla mia area Company non è neppure inserita la carta di credito sul quale è stato addebitato in quanto non ho mai accettato condizioni varie. Richiedo spiegazioni e rimborso . Attendo risposta Di seguito i dati richiesti per approfondimenti ID *****(PHONE) e mail xxxxx@xxxx.com Richiedo cancellazione abbonamenti se attivi , rimborso e cancellazione dati registrati nei vostri archivi Inviato da Outlook Da: xxxxx@xxxx.com Inviato: mercoledì 31 agosto *****(PHONE) 19:43 A: xxxxx@xxxx.com Oggetto: RE : *****(PER) Support issue submit Caro *****(PER), Questa e-mail riguarda la sua preoccupazione per gli addebiti sconosciuti. Sarò più che felice di assisterla nella sua richiesta e farò del mio meglio per aiutarla. Gli addebiti che hai ricevuto sono probabilmente legati a un servizio o a un abbonamento Company che hai sottoscritto. Se si desidera annullare l'abbonamento, seguire le indicazioni riportate di seguito: -Dal telefono Company: Impostazioni > Centro account > Pagamenti e acquisti > Abbonamenti e toccare il servizio per il quale si desidera annullare l'abbonamento. -Dal computer, accedere al sito web ufficiale: accedere a https://id7.cloud.Company.com/CAS/portal/login.html e andare su Pagamenti e acquisti > Abbonamenti/Pagamenti senza password e toccare Rimuovi. Se si accede al portale online con il telefono, è necessario attivare prima la versione desktop del browser. Se l'abbonamento scompare dal vostro conto, significa che è stato annullato con successo. Una volta annullato, non verranno effettuate detrazioni dal conto a partire dal mese successivo. Se avete bisogno di ulteriore assistenza, vi preghiamo di fornirci le seguenti informazioni, per indagare sul vostro account e fornire maggiori informazioni sull'abbonamento: 1. Il vostro ID Company (numero di telefono comprensivo di codice paese/indirizzo e-mail): 2. La richiesta: ad esempio, Annullamento dell'abbonamento Company Cloud/ Annullamento dell'abbonamento Company Music/ Annullamento dell'abbonamento Company video. 3. Prova delle transazioni: a) Se il pagamento è stato effettuato con la carta bancaria: Copia dell'estratto conto bancario che riporti gli addebiti effettuati da *****(PER) SE e le ultime 4 cifre della carta bancaria. b) Se il pagamento è stato effettuato con PayPal: Una schermata del pagamento con il numero di fattura della transazione disponibile. c) Se il pagamento è stato effettuato con il telefono: Il numero di telefono che è stato addebitato Una schermata della bolletta telefonica che mostri gli addebiti effettuati da *****(PER) SE. Se avete ulteriori domande, non esitate a rispondere a questa e-mail e saremo lieti di aiutarvi a risolvere i vostri dubbi. Apprezzeremmo molto il vostro feedback in merito al nostro scambio di e-mail, in quanto abbiamo bisogno del vostro contributo per continuare a migliorare il nostro servizio. Pertanto, vi invitiamo a compilare il sondaggio che presto arriverà all'indirizzo e-mail che avete utilizzato per contattarci. Cordiali saluti, *****(PER) Il tuo team ad Company *****(PER) SE è una società costituita secondo le leggi irlandesi con sede a *****(LOC), *****(LOC).*****(PER) SE è il fornitore di servizi mobili Company per i proprietari di dispositivi Company e Honor in *****(LOC), *****(LOC), *****(LOC), *****(LOC) e altri paesi. In dieser E-Mail geht es um Ihr Anliegen, Ihr unbekanntes Abonnement zu kündigen. Leider haben wir aus Gründen des Datenschutzes nicht die notwendige Erlaubnis, Abonnements im Namen unserer Nutzer zu kündigen. Ich werde Ihnen die Kündigungsschritte mitteilen, aber wenn Sie bei der Befolgung dieser Schritte auf Probleme stoßen, finden Sie weiter unten auch die Informationen, die wir von Ihnen benötigen, um die Angelegenheit untersuchen zu können. Bitte befolgen Sie den nächsten Leitfaden, um Ihr Problem zu lösen: - Auf Ihrem Company-Handy: Einstellungen > Kontocenter > Zahlung und Einkäufe > Abonnements und tippen Sie auf den Dienst, dessen Abonnement Sie kündigen möchten. - Greifen Sie von Ihrem Computer aus auf die offizielle Website zu: Melden Sie sich bei https://id7.cloud.Company.com/CAS/portal/login.html an und gehen Sie zu Zahlungen und Einkäufe > Abonnements/Passwortlose Zahlungen und tippen Sie auf Entfernen. Bitte beachten Sie, dass Sie beim Zugriff auf die Website von Ihrem Handy aus die Desktop-Version aktivieren müssen, damit die Registerkarte Zahlungen und Einkäufe angezeigt wird. Wenn das Abonnement aus Ihrem Konto verschwindet, bedeutet dies, dass es erfolgreich gekündigt wurde. Nach der Kündigung wird ab dem folgenden Monat nichts mehr von Ihrem Konto abgebucht. Wenn Sie weitere Hilfe benötigen, geben Sie uns bitte die folgenden Informationen, damit wir Ihr Konto überprüfen und weitere Informationen über das Abonnement bereitstellen können: 1. Wir laden Sie daher ein, die Umfrage auszufüllen, die Sie in Kürze über die E-Mail-Adresse erhalten werden, die Sie zur Kontaktaufnahme mit uns verwendet haben. Interaction content: Dear *****(PERSON), Thank you for your patience. After an investigation we have found that the purchase was made for a Cloud subscription active on account linked to ''*****(PHONE).....*****(PHONE)'' . We suggest you login using your phone number: Go to https://id7.cloud.Company.com/CAS/portal/login.html > Log in > Account Center > Payment and purchases > Subscriptions/Password-free payments and click Remove. If you will access our online portal through your phone's browser, please enable the desktop site from the side menu bar, so you will be able to see the "Payment and Purchases" window. We would greatly appreciate your feedback regarding our email exchange, as we need your input to keep improving our service. Therefore, we invite you to fill in the survey that will soon arrive on the email address you used to contact us. For further questions, please feel free to reply to this email thread and we will be happy to walk you through your doubts. Sincerely, Alexandra *****(PERSON) Customer Support team *****(PERSON) SE is a company incorporated under the laws of Ireland with its headquarters in Dublin, Ireland. *****(PERSON) SE is the provider of Company Mobile Services to Company and Honor device owners in *****(LOC), Canada, Australia, New Zealand and other countries. I have been able to follow your instructions to subscriptions/password-free payments, but there is no remove button, nothing comes on the screen to click on. Please advise further. Kind regards *****(PERSON) Welsh Get Outlook for Android From: xxxxx@xxxx.com Sent: Wednesday, August 31, *****(PHONE) 10:47:26 AM To: xxxxx@xxxx.com Subject: RE : Can el order. Dear *****(PERSON), Thank you for reaching us back. We truly apologize for any misunderstanding in our previous interactions regarding your request to cancel an order/ subscription. Interaction content: Dear customer, Thank you for contacting *****(PERSON). We hope you are doing well. I would like to follow up to your case raised on Monday 29 August *****(PHONE) . You have stated that you would like to cancel your subscription . Unfortunately, we are not allowed to delete accounts and subscriptions on behalf of our customers due to privacy policy. However, you can unsubscribe at any time, following these steps: From your computer, access the official website: login to https://id7.cloud.Company.com/CAS/portal/login.html and go to Account & Security > Payment and purchases > Subscriptions/Password-free payments and touch Remove. Please note that if you access the website from your phone, you must enable desktop version for the Payment and purchases tab to show up. If the subscription disappears from your account, it indicates that it has been canceled successfully. Once canceled, no deduction will be made from your account starting from the next month. If you need further assistance, please provide us the following information, to investigate your account and provide more information around the subscription: 1. Your Company ID (Phone number include country code/ Email address): 2. Proof of transactions: a) If the payment was made with your Bank card: Copy of your bank statement showing the charges from *****(PERSON) SE and the last 4 digits of your bank card. b) If the payment was made with your PayPal: A screenshot of payment with transaction invoice number available c) If the payment was made with your Phone: The phone number get charged A screenshot of phone bill showing the charges from *****(PERSON) SE We would greatly appreciate your feedback regarding our email exchange, as we need your input to keep improving our service. Therefore, we invite you to fill in the survey that will soon arrive on the email address you used to contact us. If you have any further questions, please feel free to reply to this email thread and we will be happy to walk you through your doubts.
